headline: CrowdStrike Named a Frost Radar™ Leader in Cloud Workload Protection
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, September 25, 2025--CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today announced it has been named an Innovation and Growth Leader in the 2025 Frost Radar™: Cloud Workload Protection Platforms, scoring highest of all vendors on the Innovation Index. Frost & Sullivan recognized CrowdStrike as the only CNAPP delivering unified, pre-runtime and runtime protection across hybrid and multi-cloud environments, accelerating the market’s shift to consolidate fragmented tools onto a single, unified platform.

headline: CrowdStrike's Scale And Profits Make It Rare Asset In Software: Analyst
summary: CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) is more competitively entrenched than ever in endpoint security while gaining traction in cloud protection and next-generation Security Information and Event Management (SIEM), according to recent customer feedback and discussions at Fal.Con 2025. This expanding market dominance and an aggressive contract strategy have led analysts to project sustained, strong recurring revenue growth well into fiscal year 2027 and beyond. Scotiabank analyst Patrick Colville upgraded C

headline: Scotiabank upgrades CrowdStrike on stronger customer traction
summary: Investing.com -- Scotiabank upgraded CrowdStrike to Sector Outperform, saying the cybersecurity firm is regaining ground after last year’s service outage and is positioned to capture market share as large enterprises consolidate vendors.
